string-array.name: xbee_rf_interfacing_descriptions
string-array.item:
Default: 4

Select/Read transmitter output power. Power levels relative to PP:
0 = -8dB
1 = -6dB
2 = -4dB
3 = -2dB
4 = 0dB

Default: 1

Select/Read module boost mode setting.
If enabled, boost mode improves sensitivity by 1dB and increases output power by 2dB, improving the link margin and range.
Read-only parameter.\n\nRead dBm output when PL4 is selected.

string-array.name: xbee_rf_interfacing_ranges
string-array.item: 0 - Boost mode disabled,1 - Boost mode enabled
